Name: Midnight Stories 3
About the game: Midnight Stories This game continues the life of Cindy, that takes 33% of the game and the rest is full of side stories with various people and hot scenes. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. The game will be in 4K ultra HD resolution and fully voiced. For the side stories a huge numbers of voice actors will be delivering crystal audio for your pleasure. The MS3 plan is to have 5 episodes and 10 side stories (at least 2 side stories per episode). I'm releasing the game earlier, in case someone is OK with the monthly updates. This supports also the game as your money is invested. As always the episodes are high quality: at least 100 renders, with the new 'choose your camera' it will be 2x 100 and at least 2x voice actors. Thank you for your support. Game Plan 1 - The Exam 1.1 Locker Room Trio 1.2 University Cinema 2 - Oh Captain, My Captain 3 - Demons in Dreams - NOAH 4 - Demons in Dreams - Liam (in progress) 5 - Two side stories: 5.1 More Diamonds 5.2 The Argument (Katie and Victoria) (in progress)
